query:
INSERT INTO initiatives (
  id, userId, userRole, userEmail, area,
  title, problemStatement, aiApproach,
  riskLevel, missionAlignmentRating,
  impact, effort, evaluationNotes, priorityQuadrant,
  evaluatedBy, evaluatedAt,
  status, createdAt, updatedAt
) VALUES
(
  210004, 4, 'Prior Authorization Specialist', 'amanda.rodriguez@adventhealth.com', 'back-office',
  'Automated Prior Authorization Assistant',
  'Prior authorization requests take 20-30 minutes each to complete manually. Our team processes 500+ requests daily, leading to staff burnout and delayed patient care. Denials due to incomplete documentation cost us $2M+ annually.',
  'Deploy an AI assistant that auto-populates prior authorization forms by extracting relevant data from EHR records, checks payer-specific requirements, and flags missing documentation before submission. Integrates with major payer portals.',
  'Low', 'High',
  'high', 'medium', 'Major pain point with proven ROI. Moderate complexity requiring payer API integration and EHR connectivity. Vendor solutions exist (Olive AI, Waystar). 60-70% time savings documented in peer health systems. Strategic investment with 12-18 month payback.',
  'strategic-bet',
  'Irvin Cruz', NOW(),
  'pending', NOW(), NOW()
),
(
  210002, 2, 'Hospitalist', 'dr.michael.chen@adventhealth.com', 'clinical-care',
  'AI-Assisted Clinical Documentation for Discharge Summaries',
  'Hospitalists spend 15-20 minutes per discharge summary, taking time away from patient care. Documentation quality varies, leading to readmission risks and compliance issues. Physicians report documentation as their #1 burnout factor.',
  'Implement ambient AI documentation (Nuance DAX or similar) that listens to physician-patient conversations and auto-generates discharge summaries, medication reconciliation, and follow-up instructions. Physician reviews and approves before signing.',
  'Medium', 'High',
  'high', 'high', 'Proven technology with major vendors (Nuance, Abridge). High implementation effort due to workflow changes, training, and EHR integration. Significant physician satisfaction and time savings (2-3 hours/day). Requires change management and quality monitoring. Strategic bet with 18-24 month ROI.',
  'strategic-bet',
  'Irvin Cruz', NOW(),
  'pending', NOW(), NOW()
),
(
  210005, 5, 'Bedside Nurse', 'emily.thompson@adventhealth.com', 'clinical-care',
  'Fall Risk Prediction & Alert System for Inpatient Units',
  'Patient falls are a leading cause of hospital-acquired injuries, averaging 3-5 falls per 1000 patient days. Current Morse Fall Scale assessments are subjective and often outdated. Falls cost us $1.5M annually in extended stays and liability.',
  'Deploy a predictive AI model that continuously analyzes patient data (medications, vitals, mobility scores, cognitive status) to identify high-risk patients in real-time. Sends alerts to nursing staff when risk scores exceed thresholds.',
  'Medium', 'High',
  'medium', 'high', 'AI fall prediction is research-stage, not production-ready. High false positive rates (60-70%) cause alert fatigue. Falls are multifactorial - AI cannot reliably predict them. Better to invest in proven interventions: hourly rounding, bed alarms, mobility programs. Reconsider until technology matures.',
  'reconsider',
  'Irvin Cruz', NOW(),
  'pending', NOW(), NOW()
),
(
  210003, 3, 'ED Nurse Manager', 'jennifer.martinez@adventhealth.com', 'clinical-operations',
  'Predictive Staffing Model for Emergency Departments',
  'ED patient volumes fluctuate unpredictably, leading to overstaffing during slow periods and understaffing during surges. Current staffing models use historical averages that do not account for seasonal trends, local events, or weather patterns.',
  'Build a machine learning model that predicts ED patient volume 24-48 hours in advance using historical data, weather forecasts, local events, and flu surveillance data. Automatically generates optimal staffing schedules and alerts managers to adjust shifts.',
  'Low', 'High',
  'medium', 'high', 'Complex modeling with uncertain ROI. ED volumes driven by unpredictable factors (trauma, community outbreaks). High implementation effort for custom ML model, data integration, and ongoing maintenance. Better to focus on flex staffing pools and cross-training. Reconsider - not worth the investment vs. proven operational strategies.',
  'reconsider',
  'Irvin Cruz', NOW(),
  'pending', NOW(), NOW()
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute INSERT INTO initiatives (
  id, userId, userRole, userEmail, area,
